title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1
overview: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 is the world's thinnest tablet, offering a sleek design, a powerful dual-core processor, and an immersive Android 3.0 Honeycomb experience.
details: Runs on Android 3.0 Honeycomb with a pure Android experience.
1GHz dual-core Tegra 2 processor for smooth performance.
10.1-inch WXGA capacitive touch screen with 1280x800 resolution.
Equipped with a 3MP rear camera with LED flash and a 2MP front camera.
HSPA+ connectivity up to 21Mbps for fast mobile data speeds.
Supports 720p HD video recording and 1080p HD playback.
DLNA support for seamless media sharing.
Connectivity options include Bluetooth 2.1, USB 2.0, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, and gyroscope.
Expandable storage via microSD slot and a 3.5mm headphone jack.
Samsung Stick – a Bluetooth microphone for hands-free use.
Pre-loaded with Social Hub, Reader’s Hub, Music Hub, and Mini Apps Tray.
Adobe Flash Player 10.2 support for enhanced web browsing.
Powered by a 6860mAh battery providing up to 10 hours of video playback.

specifications.Battery: 6860mAh, up to 10 hours of video playback
specifications.Additional Features: Samsung Stick Bluetooth microphone, Social Hub, Adobe Flash Player 10.2
